sentences.sentence: The creators of the original X-Men abbreviated the title of its sequel to simply X2.
sentences.translation: 第1部《X战警》的创作者们把其续集的片名缩写成简单的《X2》。

sentences.sentence: MegaFace's creators say it's the largest publicly available facial-recognition dataset out there.
sentences.translation: “巨型面”的创建者表示，这是目前最大的公共人脸识别数据集。

sentences.sentence: We are looking for smart creators to design an app to help communities meet with the challenges they face.
sentences.translation: 我们正在寻找聪明的创造者来设计一个应用程序，以帮助社区应对他们面临的挑战。
